src:
Wishnutama Mau Bikin Event Wisata di Indonesia Jadi Lebih Keren
05 Nov 2019, 18:55 by Afif Farhan


Foto: (Afif/detikcom)

Jakarta - Indonesia punya banyak event wisata seperti festival sampai pawai budaya. Menteri Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif (Menparekraf) Wishnutama bertekad membuatnya jadi makin keren.Dalam acara Ngopi Bareng Mas Tama dan Mbak Angela yang digelar Kementerian Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif di M Bloc Space, Jakarta Selatan, Selasa (5/11/2019), Menparekraf Wishnutama dan wakilnya, Angela Tanoesoedibjo, bertemu dengan puluhan media nasional.Wishnutama membicarakan banyak hal, soal sektor pariwisata dan ekonomi kreatif. Salah satu irisan dari dua hal tersebut adalah event wisata. Ada pariwisata dan ekonomi kreatifnya."Pesan presiden, menciptakan Calender of Event. Kita selama ini hanya mengkoordinir dan men-support," terangnya.Wishnutama berujar, ke depannya Kemenparekraf akan lebih memperhatikan bahkan memoles hal tersebut. Tujuannya adalah demi menjadikan suatu event wisata daerah dilirik dan jadi magnet buat turis mancanegara."Ke depan kita memperhatikan, bahkan membuat untuk jadi daya tarik bukan hanya wisatawan dalam negeri tapi juga luar negeri," tegasnya.Menurut Wishnutama, tiap daerah di Indonesia juga punya karateristik masing-masing yang bisa dikemas jadi daya tarik. Hanya tinggal bagaimana mengemasnya."Kita harus berani melakukan perubahan, terobosan lebih efisien dan efektif untuk satu tujuan menunu Indonesia Maju," tutupnya.Simak Video "Kembangkan 5 Destinasi Wisata Prioritas, Wishnutama Ingin Libatkan YouTuber"[Gambas:Video 20detik](aff/krs)
text:
Wishnutama Wants to Make Travel Events in Indonesia So Cool
05 Nov 2019, 18:55 by Afif Farhan


Photo: (Afif / detikcom)

Jakarta - Indonesia has many tourist events such as festivals to cultural marches. Minister of Tourism and Creative Economy (Menparekraf) Wishnutama was determined to make it even more cool. In the Coffee Drinking event with Mas Tama and Mbak Angela held by the Ministry of Tourism and Creative Economy at M Bloc Space, South Jakarta, Tuesday (11/05/2019), Menparekraf Wishnutama and his representative, Angela Tanoesoedibjo, met with dozens of national media. Wishnutama discussed many things, about the tourism sector and the creative economy. One slice of the two things is a tourist event. There is tourism and creative economy. "Message from the president, creating a Calender of Event. So far, we only coordinate and support," he explained. Wishnutama said, in the future Kemenparekraf will pay more attention to even polish it. The aim is to make an area tourism event glance and become a magnet for foreign tourists. "Going forward we pay attention, and even make it an attraction not only for domestic tourists but also abroad," he said. According to Wishnutama, every region in Indonesia also has each characteristic that can be packaged as an attraction. All that remains is how to package it. "We must dare to make changes, breakthroughs more efficiently and effectively for the purpose of meeting Indonesia Forward," he concluded. Watch Video "Develop 5 Priority Travel Destinations, Wishnutama Wants to Involve YouTubers" [Gambas: Video 20second] (aff / krs)
